text: Prevention is being conscious of your decisions- for example; if don’t have a refillable bottle, choose a clear plastic so at least it can be easily recycled as opposed to a darker colour that’s harder to break down and dispose of in the waste systems we have #Ploughing19pic.twitter.com/XVVkUgXXRv

Good to see @marksandspencer putting waste prevention measures in place from latest @IEMA_Transform magazine. I noted this in @sainsburys #Derry last weekend also but don’t think a discount was given 🤷‍♀️ Will our Irish retailers such as @SuperValuIRL @dunnesstores follow suit?🤷‍♀️pic.twitter.com/86deTwwkte
